content: > learn how to crochet a simple solid > granny square using your favourite > worsted weight yarn helpful photos > with labeled stitches provide a clear > visual of each round find the free > tutorial at sweet bee crochet 1 materials needed - approx 17 yards of worsted weight yarn for one square that is 4 rounds - 4mm hook or other hook size appropriate to your yarn choice - yarn needle - scissors happy crocheting > join the sweet bee crochet facebook > group to show off your pretty squares > click here to check it out 2 1 https //sweetbeecrochet com/solid-granny-square-crochet-tutorial/ 2 https //www facebook com/groups/sweetbeecrochet
